com.vaadin.addon.timeline
Class Timeline.DateFormatInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.addon.timeline.Timeline.DateFormatInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing class:
Timeline
public class Timeline.DateFormatInfo
extends Object
implements Serializable

Describes the date formats used by the Timeline.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getDateSelectDisplaySimpleDateFormat

public String getDateSelectDisplaySimpleDateFormat()
Get the date format which is used to display the selected date range in the top right corner. See SimpleDateFormat for format details.

Returns:
A format describing how the date should be formatted
